meanings.definition: A performance or entertainment presented on a stage or dance floor.
meanings.sent1: The floorshows at the school talent show were full of singing and dancing.
meanings.sent2: The theater hosted dazzling floorshows every weekend.
meanings.sent3: During the floorshows, the audience couldn't stop clapping and cheering.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements turned the stage into a magical floorshows wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The colorful costumes added a vibrant touch to the floorshows.

meanings.definition: The act of presenting a show or performance on a floor.
meanings.sent1: The energetic floorshows captivated the audience's attention.
meanings.sent2: The circus performers practiced their floorshows routines diligently.
meanings.sent3: The floorshows rehearsal turned into a hilarious comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling transformed the simple act into a mesmerizing floorshows experience.
meanings.sent5: The grand finale of the floorshows left everyone in awe.
